attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Manchester has been insulted and used as a political football because the super casino has been suspended. I petition the labour party to invest in this area with another project to regenerate the area with national significance. The decision has been reversed after due process and this is an insult to the whole manchester area. I asked people to support the oridginal decision or find an alternative.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
